channel.title: [Deltascape] need Server help!
channel.description:
Im making a private server based on deltascape! i got it running but there are somethings in which i dont know how to do it? Please help me answer them..
1. How do i change the start point and home of server? 2. How do i add commands? like ::pure 3. When you start, on the chat box(in some servers)it gives you a message saying vote on www.blahblah.com(lol, dont click idk if its real!), how do i change that? 4. How can i make it so that i have infinite run energy? 5. Last, how do i change the fight cave waves from 63 to i.e 7 waves?
please please please take the time to answer my questions the best you can. Also only answer if you have or now about deltascape based servers!
if you have msn add me at corncake117@hotmail.com

item.title: [Deltascape] need Server help!
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

Ok, here lil basic Tut

1. How do i change the start point and home of server?
go into clickingmost.java search the coord u wana change,
2. How do i add commands? like ::pure
Add this above ::Pickup -->
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); sM("You are know ready for pking =)");

thats all i no with deltascape

Read full topic

item.title: [Deltascape] need Server help!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

To be honest, if you are this new at coding, try with a more simple base.

Read full topic
